summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of Lot two (2), in Block eleven (11), of the Plat of the town (now City) of Seattle, as laid out on the claims of C. D. Boren and A. A. Denny, excepting the easterly nine (9) feet thereof taken by the City of Seattle for the widening of Third Avenue, as an addition and betterment to and extension of the municipal light and power plant and system of the city, for as substation site, and making an appropriation therefor.
